content:
FedEx Developer Portal will experience interruption from 07/13/2024, 9:00 PM CT - 07/14/2024, 2:00 AM CT.
We apologize for any inconvenience such as slow response or technical difficulties. Thank you for your patience!

Menu
 Developer Portal
Shipment Visibility Webhook

FedEx Shipment Visibility Webhook delivers near real-time tracking push notifications directly to your servers. You get timely shipment visibility and best-in-class recipient tracking  - with a flexible solution you can configure to meet your unique business needs. Subscribers are charged a monthly fee, based on the count of tracking number(s). 

EXPLORE DOCUMENTATION

Configure Shipment Visibility Webhook for a personalized solution

Configure Shipment Visibility Webhook to improve your workflows and streamline your processes – throughout the shipping and customer order lifecycles.

Enhance customer experience

Send proactive notifications for in-transit changes to shipment status, Estimated Delivery Date and Day Of Delivery Time Window

Reduce customer service costs

Reduce WISMO (Where Is My Order) calls as well as delivery disputes by providing FedEx Picture Proof of Delivery

Build your brand

Provide shipment tracking, notifications for your customers in a branded environment, within your own website or application.



Our most powerful shipment  tracking solution

Building on the power of Track API, the new Shipment Visibility Webhook takes our shipment tracking solutions even farther.

FEATURES	TRACK API	SHIPMENT VISIBILITY WEBHOOK ($) 
Near real-time push notifications	 	
Track updates by account number	 	
Estimated delivery date 		
Estimated delivery time window: 4 hour		
Shipment tracking status		
Exception, delay event information		
Signature proof of delivery (SPOD)		
Picture proof of delivery (PPOD)	 	
Retry and redelivery for missed events	 	
A tracking solution to support your  unique business needs

Shipment Visibility Webhook delivers near real-time tracking push notifications directly to your servers – how you configure the solution is up to you.




Pass delivery predictions along to your customers

Get near real-time track updates – including estimated delivery date (EDD), estimated delivery time window (EDTW), and a 1 hour pre-delivery notification – and trigger branded notifications for customers across web, mobile, email, and SMS.




Validate the delivery of high-value shipments

Picture proof of delivery (PPOD) helps you combat porch piracy and quickly address customer service disputes – and helps customers know just where their package is.




Get only the data you need

If you want to receive small data packets, configure Shipment Visibility Webhook to get only your most recent tracking event information.




Manage resources based on tracking predictions

Reliable event-driven tracking updates – including exceptions and delays – allow you to manage resources.




Get historical tracking details with retry and redelivery mechanisms

We'll try to resend track event data to your servers within 6 hour time window, in case of missed acknowledgement.




Manage accounts and subscriptions with ease

Set up a subscription through the FedEx Developer Portal then add new account-based subscriptions programmatically.

Ready to integrate with Shipment Visibility Webhook?

Learn more about pricing and how to integrate with Shipment Visibility Webhook in our developer documentation.

EXPLORE DOCUMENTATION
Still have questions?

Discover if Shipment Visibility Webhook is right for you by exploring our frequently asked questions.

VISIT OUR WEBHOOKS FAQS

Are you an existing Web Services or FedEx Ship Manager Server Customer? If so, you can still access the Developer Resource Center.
